titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1979) to amend title 49, United States Code, to provide assistance for the reconstruction of certain air traffic control towers.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-515, by Ms. Pryce (OH).

It shall be in order to consider as an original bill for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule the amendment in the nature of a substitute recommended by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure now printed in the bill.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 174.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 447.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 419 - 0 (Roll no. 240).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/18/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (open) for the consideration of H.R. 1979 (air traffic control tower construction assistance).
